entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 6.1°C

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 73 %

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
